revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CradlePoint |model=MBR1000 |revision= |upc=804879165217 |asin=B0013MTPC8 |est_release_date=02/08/2008 |fcc_date=01/30/2008 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=U-MEDIA |manuf_model=WRT-384U |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=UXX-MBR1000 |ic_id=6921A-MBR1000 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ubicom |cpu1_model=IP5100U |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=STMicro |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI, USB 2.0, ExpressCard/34 (USB), |expansion_expresscard_num=1 |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=U-MEDIA WMB-370L |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2860 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2820 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8306S |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=3G/4G capable, |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=MBR-XXX |default_ssid_regex=^MBR-[a-f0-9]{3}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:30:44 |oui_eth=00:30:44 }} {{TagLine|Failsafe Mobile Broadband N Router}} :[http://www.cradlepoint.com/products/mbr1000 Support page]
*"WRT-384U" and "REV:UD" is silkscreened on the main board. *"WMB-370L Rev. UB" is silkscreened on the wireless module.
